description: While scouting ahead, Anonsky spots a distant anomaly and, upon returning, Sarik reports a strange reading on the detector. The team sets up camp to discuss these findings, where Danila Matador advocates for a cautious approach. After some debate, they decide to adopt Anonsky's plan, and the next morning, he leads the group towards the anomaly.
The group encounters a patch of irradiated area, %s navigates a safe path
%s detects a strong energy signature close by
%s uncovers a hidden artifact emitting strange sounds
While examining the artifact, %s hears distant howls
%s suggests hurrying back due to the howls
